name: DGDN Universe Part 3.1
description: After helping Desean resurrect the nightmarien. Damon appears and he's furious. Desean tricks him and says it was Jordan's idean to restore the three nightmarien and he goes after him. Jaden decides to go after Desean but instead meets Jade in the Psykon Area. She's looking for the nightmarien crystals and says Jaden to help her. The Nightmarien, DG, DN and Darts chase after Jaden. After Finding the crystals They head down to the city only to be confronted by Shane.
